entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 9. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then snow beginning before morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
